content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 6.0, 0.0)

### Wooden chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entity:
- Wooden chest (position 8.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the inventory is full (50/50 items).

### Errors when attempting to insert items without sufficient inventory
- Make sure to check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into any entity. The error indicates that there was no iron ore available to insert.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
